mark.description: Title for a context menu item marking selected text

unmark.description: Title for a context menu item unmarking selected text

palette.description: Title for a context menu section revealing colours to set the current marking one

marker_green.description: Title for a context menu item choosing green as a current colour

marker_red.description: Title for a context menu item choosing red as a current colour

marker_pink.description: Title for a context menu item choosing pink as a current colour

marker_orange.description: Title for a context menu item choosing orange as a current colour

marker_yellow.description: Title for a context menu item choosing yellow as a current colour

marker_blue.description: Title for a context menu item choosing blue as a current colour

note_add.description: Title for a context menu item adding a note

note_add_prompt.description: Message for prompting a user to enter text for a new note

note_remove.description: Title for a context menu item removing a note

note_navigation.description: Title for a context menu section revealing links to scroll page notes into view

storage.description: Title for a context menu section revealing storage options

save.description: Title for a context menu item saving marks and notes on a page

save_success_msg.description: What user sees after a page has been saved to storage

load.description: Title for a context menu item loading marks and notes on a page

load_msg.description: What user sees when a page is being loaded from storage

load_success_msg.description: What user sees after a page has been loaded from storage

preferences.description: Title for a context menu item relocating to the preferences page

preferences_option_warning.message: Предупреждать о несохранённых изменениях на странице
preferences_option_warning.description: Description of a preferences option managing warnings about unsaved changes on a page

preferences_option_auto_load.description: Description of a preferences option managing autoloading a page

preferences_option_default_colour.description: Description of a preferences option setting a default colour

page_unload_warn.message: You will discard all unsaved changes on this page when leaving
page_unload_warn.description: Warning when there is a try to leave a page with unsaved changes

preferences_page_table.description: Label for a table listing all saved pages in the preferences

preferences_page_table_page_header.description: Label for a page table column header featuring a page name

preferences_page_table_date_header.description: Label for a page table column header showing a date when a page was saved

preferences_search.description: Placeholder for a field filtering saved pages

preferences_page_show_btn.description: Label for a button showing a saved page in a new tab

preferences_page_remove_btn.description: Label for a button removing a saved page

preferences_page_insert_btn.description: Label for a button inserting a page package into storage

preferences_page_unpsert_btn.description: Label for a button upserting a page package into storage

preferences_page_export_btn.description: Label for a button exporting saved pages as a page package

preferences_save_btn.description: Label for a button saving all the preferences

import_inserted_page_count.description: Status featuring a number of successfully imported pages

import_wrong_format_error.message: Ошибка импорта: неверный формат файла пакета страниц

package_empty_info_error.description: Error message when an imported package is empty

package_unknown_error.description: Error message for an unknown failure while operating page packages

description.message: Highbrighter для отметки текста, создания заметок и навигации по ним через контекстное меню. Все изменения на странице могут быть сохранены и загружены позже
description.description: Description of the extension from manifest.json
